title: Deep Learning Overview
subject: Artificial Intelligence
theory:
Simulating the human brain. 
Layers of nodes (Neurons) weighted connections. 
**Deep** = Many hidden layers. Capable of learning raw features (pixels) directly.

interview_questions.question: Why Deep Learning now?
interview_questions.answer: 1. Big Data available. 2. GPU computing power. 3. Algorithm improvements (ReLU, Adam).
